name: Unmangled
tagline: We help unmangle your traffic jams!
body:
### Beware the Mangle Mites!
Throughout the history of the Internets, websites have fallen victim to mangle mites. If left untreated, they can pollute your website traffic to the point of affecting your revenues. They are are an elusive species!

### What are mangle-mites?
They have many names: Internet robots, WWW robots, or simply bots.

### Unmanglers to the Rescue!
We here at Unmangled have recently developed technology that have exposed them in the wild. We will be able to identify and prevent mangle mites from even reaching your website!

### Contact
makeme@unmanged.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
